post.body: LOL if I make him give it back, can I keep him? ;)
Awesome, will definitely be buying it on the 1st! Merry Christmas!!
MERRY XMAS EVERYONE!! :D
On the hunt for Xmas snacky food.
Watching Flight of the Navigator and feeling like a wee kid again! :)
Watching Stardust curled up in bed with big pillows. Comfy :)
Just out of The Day The Earth Stood Still, twas pretty good!
In Glasgow Xmas shopping with G. Nice spicy lunch on the go :)
V happy about the casting of Robert Carlisle in Stargate Universe! Here's hoping they don't kill him off early on as a lame ratings draw!
Last night's Heroes, EPIC! I'll survive Xmas and New Year, then begins the 'why's it not Feb 2nd yeeeet' whine.
Updating Wordpress to 2.7 :)
Have just returned home at 3am to be blinded by neon central!! http://twitpic.com/rt8c
Watching Lee Evans latest show with G. Luvs it!!
Of to G's to put up Xmas decorations there. :)
Heroes promo for next week looks epic! Writing/directional catastrophe over? Yaaay!!
Getting a bit more Xmas shopping done. Ugh, why's everyone so hard to buy for this year??
ThinkGeek Xmas FTW! http://twitpic.com/rj33
It's FREEZIN'!! I'm off to hide under the quilt with my laptop! BRR!
Loving LoudTwitter! Just started using it to post my daily tweet summary to my LJ. :)
It's Heroes Monday, yaaaaaay!! :D
